Description:
------------
RECOMMENDED, simple and uncomplicated, ideal for 99% of people

BurnAware is a simple program that records any data CD and DVD, audio, Blue-Ray, and can create disk images.
It supports the vast majority of recorders, check the recorded disc, supports multisession formatted disks.
BurnAware Professional is the choice for professional users to burn CD / DVD / Blu-ray. It offers a wide range of advanced functionality, allowing you to duplicate CDs and DVDs, make exact copies of discs of photos, games, movies, pfrogramas, on your hard drive, and burn to multiple drives simultaneously.

History of Changes
---------------------

improvements:
-------------

Few improvements in the user interface have been implemented.
Better data buffer during the recording process.
Optimized data transfer for copying audio CD CUE image.
Optimized buffer usage during copy from disk to disk.
corrections:
--------
Fixed error with verification of DVD-R/RW discs.
Fixed error with writing blank data collection.
Solved problems burning DVDs with poor quality

1. - Install the program, do not start it.
2. - Copy the contents of the folder "Crack" to "C:  Program Files  BurnAware Professional" Replace.

Ready!!
